channel.title: Help - moving ncp & make him talk
channel.description: Ok i wont to move shilop (781) to cords X: 3252 Y: 3430 - and make him say Attack the Dummies! If you could do this i would think much of you. This is for my server, so help me make it better please, If some 1 could tell me how or make a code and where to put it that would be nice. Thanks. Admin of Foxscape.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 30, 2006, 02:17:26 AM[/size][hr]Please help.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 30, 2006, 02:20:21 AM[/size][hr]Come on...

item.title: Help - moving ncp & make him talk
item.dc:creator: @meeped meeped
item.description:
@meeped wrote:

okay,

so go to Autospawn.java and go to the bottom

now you will see somthing on the lines like this

[code]
spawn = 535 2836 10213 0 2836 10213 2836 10213 2 fairykeeperinownerpalace

[\code]

copy and paste that right above where it says [ENDOFSPAWNLIST

now change 535 to 781 since its the guy you want.

next, change the co-ords which are the 2 next sets of numbers after EX: 2836 – being the first one after 535 put in the first co-ords as 3252 and for 10213 change it to 3430.

EXAMPLE ON HOW IT SHOULD LOOK:

[code]

spawn = 781 3252 3430 0 2836 10213 2836 10213 2 fairykeeperinownerpalace

[\code]

Next:

what source do you have.

it depends on what source you have so i can make him talk.

post it quickly please i dont wanna wait for you all night[/code][/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Help - moving ncp & make him talk
